title: Advice for Longer CV Joints Life
author: Loyale 2.7 Turbo
content: Loyale 2.7 Turbo contributes a massive amount of write-ups to USMB and has years of experience keeping jalopy subarus running in his home, Honduras. This writeup is general and true for most cars. The most important part is keeping them lubricated with CV joint grease and not lifting farther than their working angle.
